seo.title: Gangadhar Shebannavar - Cloud & Infra Engineer Portfolio
seo.description: Portfolio of Gangadhar Shebannavar - AWS Cloud & Infra Engineer at LTIMindtree, expert in AWS, monitoring, and automation.
seo.keywords: aws, cloud engineer, infrastructure, devops, portfolio
seo.author: Gangadhar Shebannavar

header.tagline: AWS Cloud & Infra Engineer | Automation | Uptime | Cloud Security

paragraphs: AWS Cloud & Infra Engineer with 2+ years of experience in managing cloud infrastructure, IAM, monitoring, and incident response. Passionate about designing scalable solutions, ensuring cloud security, and delivering reliable infrastructure.

Currently working at LTIMindtree in Bengaluru, focusing on AWS services (EC2, S3, VPC, IAM), availability, and automation. Proven track record in reducing manual effort, improving alerts, and maintaining high uptimes for enterprise environments.

items.name: Static Website Deployment using Amazon S3
description: Built a highly available and cost-efficient static website using Amazon S3.
Configured hosting with HTTPS, versioning, cross-region replication, and lifecycle policies.
Achieved 99.9% uptime and reduced storage costs by 35% through automation.

items.name: AWS Resource Automation with Terraform
description: Automated repeatable infrastructure setups for IAM users, EC2 instances, and S3 buckets.
Used Terraform templates to cut deployment time from 45 minutes to 10 minutes.

items.name: VPC Monitoring with Flow Logs
description: Enabled VPC Flow Logs and analyzed network traffic using CloudWatch Logs Insights.
Enhanced proactive threat detection; reduced networking issue resolution time by 60%.

responsibilities: Managed AWS (EC2, S3, VPC, IAM) for stability, access, and availability in enterprise settings.
Configured Route 53 DNS for high-uptime internal and client services.
Optimized Datadog, Dynatrace, Opsgenie alerts—reduced false positives by 25%.
Provisioned and managed IAM roles and policy-based access.
Improved incident handling through better documentation and audit-ready practices.
Supported Linux/Windows EC2 instances; handled patching, troubleshooting, performance checks.
Up-to-date with AWS advancements and cloud security.

categories.name: Certifications
items: AWS Foundational and Architecting Course - Ethnus
AWS Academy Cloud Foundations (Cloud Quest: Cloud Practitioner)

categories.name: Awards
